name: Magic Mask Escape
description:
Controls:

Left click - Interaction
Right click - zoom out again (from close ups)
A/D - Rotate camera
__________________________________________________________

This is a prototype for a puzzle-solving adventure-type game created as part of the Weekly Game Jam #131. It's not a complete game, rather a proof of concept of the base mechanics I was thinking about doing. If people like it, I might continue work on it to make it a more polished (and longer) game. 

You can let me know what you think in the comments or in the Weekly Game Jam Discord (username Mikos).

Enjoy.
